com.sterlingcommerce.security.dv

Class SCStringValidationRule<T extends SCValidationContext>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.security.dv.SCBaseValidationRule<T>
      • com.sterlingcommerce.security.dv.SCStringValidationRule<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISCValidationRule

    public class SCStringValidationRule<T extends SCValidationContext>
extends SCBaseValidationRule<T>
    This is an adapter validation class which internally uses ESAPI StringValidation rule. asmishra T the type of validation context to be fetched by SCBaseValidationRule.getValidationContext() method.
